state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to open the stone gateway within the shower. After pulling open the stone gateway, go south. After that, try to head east. After that, retrieve the passkey from the rack within the sauna. After that, make an effort to go to the north. And then, go to the west. And then, make it so that the gateway inside the shower is unlocked. After that, open the gateway. After you have pulled open the gateway, attempt to take a trip west. Once you succeed at that, travel south. And then, make an effort to take a trip south. Then, make an attempt to move south. And then, take a trip south. With that over with, recover the latchkey from the chair inside the canteen. And once you've done that, you win! -= Shower =- You've just sauntered into a shower. There is a closed stone gateway leading south. There is a closed gateway leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Shower =-0/1

next_state: -= Study =- You arrive in a study. A standard kind of place. There is an open stone gateway leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is a cookie on the floor. > -= Study =-0/3
